Martin Thwait

NPC ID3193

Martin Thwait is a rogue who can be found inside the Rogues' Den, located in Burthorpe by entering a trapdoor inside The Toad and Chicken inn. He sells a variety of Thieving-related items, like lockpicks for chests, stethoscopes for the local vaults, and an assortment of claws.

If a player has achieved 99 Thieving, they can purchase a Thieving cape and its respective hood from him for 99,000 coins. To access his store, players must have a level of 50 or higher in both the Thieving and Agility skills, or have a Thieving level of 99. Boosts cannot be used to fulfill either of these requirements.

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Martin Thwait is the solution to the hard anagram clue: RAT MAT WITHIN. The answer to his challenge: How many natural fires burn in Rogue's Den? is 2.

Thieving cape[edit | edit source]

If a player has 99 Thieving, they will have access to a duplicate version of the shop, with the only difference being the addition of the Thieving cape. The stock of this shop is not shared with the regular shop.

Thieving cape10.6s 99,000N/ANot sold

Thieving cape(t)[edit | edit source]

For players with 99 Thieving and at least one other 99, they will access a second duplicate shop. Just like the previous, the stock of this shop is not shared with the others.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
3 March 2021
(update)

Iron and non-Iron characters now have separate shops with Martin Thwait inside the Rogues' Den. In addition, the de-stock rate has been altered slightly for Iron players.

4 October 2005 –
7 February 2006

The NPC's examine was changed from "A loveable rogue"[sic] to "A loveable rogue."

present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Martin appears to have his Thieving hood equipped, but it rests on the back of his cape rather than on his head.
